entry.title: Ukraine Accuses Russia of Digging Mass Graves for Civilian Victims
entry.content: Ukrainian officials accused Russia of burying thousands of civilians in mass graves outside Mariupol, as Moscow pressed its offensive to capture the rest of the eastern Donbas region.

entry.title: In Obliterated Kharkiv, Ukrainian Survivors Struggle to Hold Out
entry.content: Parts of what was a sophisticated hub of Ukraineâ€™s science and research now lack basic amenities like running water and electricity. Some 2,000 high-rises have been destroyed, according to the municipality.
